venue.name: The Healing Center at Our Weeping Angel Foundation

item.description:
Have you always been curious to learn more about your past lives? Do you believe it's possible that you've lived before, that you were someone else? Do you wonder if past life relationships are affecting you currently? Can strengths and talents from your earlier lives be cultivated now? 

Tonight, you'll hypnotically Time Travel on a journey of inner discovery. 
Wear comfortable clothing and bring a pillow, mat and blanket, if desired.

 

Facilitated by Kathryn McGlynn, Certified Hypnotist, who has been Time Travelling since her first regression in 1977.

 

For more information, visit : http://www.hypnosis.ws

 

 

.

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: Past Life Regression - hypnosis seminar
